name: VR Mental Training
summary: The VR Mental Training System is a product that applies innovative technology to help people relieve negative emotions. With virtual reality technology, we provide an immersive experience for users to confront and learn to manage their sources of stress and negative emotions. Our VR Mental Training System has developed different training scenarios, such as Island Beach, designed for relaxation. During the use of the system, users can interact with people and objects in the immersive VR scenes.
